tv.matchstick.flint
类 Flint.Listener

java.lang.Object
  tv.matchstick.flint.Flint.Listener
包容类：
Flint
public abstract static class Flint.Listener
extends java.lang.Object

Interface which will be notified when Flint application's status is changed.

构造方法摘要
Flint.Listener()
           
 
方法摘要
 void onApplicationDisconnected(int statusCode)
          Called when connection to the receiver is disconnected.such as when another client has launched a new application.
 void onApplicationStatusChanged()
          Called when application's status changed
 void onVolumeChanged()
          Called when application volume or mute status changed
